General narrative about content.

## Examples of posts

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library("magrittr")
create_link <- function(x)  {
  glue::glue("{gluedown::md_link(x$description, x$url)}:  {x$long}"
  )
}

yaml::read_yaml(system.file("posts-selection", "posts.yaml",
                  package="roblog")) %>%
  purrr::map_chr(create_link) %>%
  gluedown::md_list() %>%
  glue::glue_collapse("\n") %>%
  details::details(summary = "Click to get a list of exemplary posts", lang = NULL)
```

## Now what?

If your post is about a peer-reviewed package, also read [the specific guidance for such posts](https://docs.ropensci.org/roblog/articles/content-guidelines-peer-reviewed-pkg.html).

Otherwise, proceed to read the technical guidance.
